title: Looking for a Bronzie duo partner to climb with
body: Hello all, I was Silver V start of this season but I have dropped a fair bit, I'm currently Bronze 4 and looking for someone to climb with. If you've got common sense and communication you make the cut lol. I main support, adc and I can mid fairly well. I will usually play champs: Janna, Leona, Sona, Lulu, Thresh, Caitlyn, Jinx, Lux, Ahri, Xerath.  If anyone's interested give me your summoner name and rank or just add Axivia. Cheers!

replies.body:
Hi mate, I sent you a friend request, I too am in the same boat. Having to rely on someone who can't really communicate with me, im looking to change that and have someone I can talk to on skype or teamspeak.

I am also looking to play adc/support, I also do a bit of jungling. Hit me up and hope to hear from you soon!

JJ
